created_time: December 04, 2022, 11:12:58 AMLast edit: December 04, 2022, 01:47:51 PM by 16xypjnxlrew
content: I want to exchange 4 SFP (SafePal) for BNB. I prefer BNB only BEP20.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Just go to pancakeswap and have it exchanged there. If there's no direct exchange from SFP > BNB then just do the other trades first like SFP > CAKE/WBNB.And from there, you can exchange it into BNB since it's not that really much.

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: Quote from: blockman on December 05, 2022, 06:48:34 AMJust go to pancakeswap and have it exchanged there. If there's no direct exchange from SFP > BNB then just do the other trades first like SFP > CAKE/WBNB.And from there, you can exchange it into BNB since it's not that really much.The network fee will be more than 5%
